content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (40.5, -83.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (40.5, -83.5), (41.5, -83.5), and (42.5, -83.5) for storing coal and iron plates
- Transport Belt connecting from (40.5, -83.5) to (38.5, -83.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Burner Inserter at position (1.5, 0.5) transferring items from a wooden chest at (2.5, 0.5) to the furnace
- Wooden Chest at position (2.5, 0.5) for storing input materials

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Burner Inserters at positions (6.5, 0.5), (8.5, 0.5), and (11.5, 0.5) waiting for source items
- Wooden Chests at positions (7.5, 0.5), (10.5, 1.5), and (12.5, 0.5) for storing copper plates and iron plates
- Transport Belt connecting from (3.5, 0.5) to (5.5, 0.5)

### Coal Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chests at positions (28.5, 0.5), (30.5, 0.5), (32.5, 0.5), (34.5, 0.5), (36.5, 0.5), and (38.5, 0.5) for storing coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Removing Chests
- Ensure that the correct method is used to remove a chest. The 'Chest' object is not callable, indicating a misuse of the API.

### Errors when Setting Up New Storage
- Verify the presence of the entity type at the specified position before attempting to set up new storage. Ensure that a wooden chest exists at the intended location.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source chest or entity has the necessary items for the inserter to function. Refill the source chest with required items to avoid delays.

### Errors when Managing Inventory
- Check the inventory capacity before attempting to insert items. Avoid trying to insert more items than the inventory can hold.

### Errors with Empty Source Chests
- Regularly check and refill source chests to ensure continuous operation of inserters and production lines.
